title: Redford sans serif
content:
Does anybody know where I can buy a font named Redford, **not the Blue Vinyl version** , this is a humanist sans serif.

Thanks in advance,  
Tim
author: timd

comments.content: Tim, can you post a sample? It could be a font by another name.

I can't post a sample until I go back to work on Tuesday, long weekend hurray. It might indeed be a renamed font.

Tim
Can't locate. May be an alias. Need a sample.
Haha. I guess I should read before posting.

Back to work, this is a sample, a lot of the characteristics remind me of Frutiger but I cannot nail it down, if it is an alias.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014080147im_/http:/typophile.com/files/redford_sample_3966.jpg)

Thanks again,  
Tim

I think you are right, now to discover why they changed the name.  
Thanks,  
Tim
